text: Eulepetopsis vitrea is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Neolepetopsidae, one of the families of true limpets. Eulepetopsis vitrea is the only species in the genus Eulepetopsis. ==Description== ==Distribution== Galapagos Rift and the East Pacific Rise == Habitat == hydrothermal vents ==References== ==External links== * Category:Neolepetopsidae Category:Gastropods described in 1990
title: Eulepetopsis vitrea
